mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setmeal(category_id, name, price, description, image, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{image}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: SELECT sd.name, sd.copies, d.image, d.description FROM setmeal_dish sd left join dish d on sd.dish_id = d.id setmeal_id = #{setmealId}

SELECT * FROM setmeal
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
order by create_time desc
